title: Radgepacket - Tales From The Inner cities
description: 'Radgepacket - Tales from the Inner Cities' is a short fiction collection that reflects the grimy, gritty nature of modern day Britain. It's funny, dark, challenging and at times a little bit naughty. If you're tired of chick lit and boy wizards and want to read something a little more realistic then give this a go.
author: Danny King
